name: TEN SECONDS TO GIFT
description:
This is a short 5 level game I made for the yogscast game jam.

The goal is simple. Your an elf who has ten seconds to get to a child to give him a gift or else you won't be on time.

To play the game you must download the game-windows.zip and extract it to a new folder. Then just run the exe and you are all set.
